paragraph: Ahead of the midterm elections, with everything at stake, MSNBC's Jacob Soboroff  talked to critical voters in the swing districts,  to find out what matters most to the people whose votes could matter the most.  In part 1 of the MSNBC special, he took a closer look at what’s on the minds of voters in Maine's 2nd Congressional District.Nov. 4, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
